Module kivakit.core.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem

Class FolderPruner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem.FolderPruner
  • public class FolderPruner
extends java.lang.Object
    Removes nested files matching matcher(Matcher) from the given folder when they meet expiration criteria.

    Expiration Criteria

    The minimum age of surviving files can be set with minimumAge(Duration). Files will also be pruned (from oldest to newest) if disk space falls below minimumUsableDiskSpace(Percent) or when the folder's total size exceeds capacity(Bytes).

    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
